official_title: Protecting Our Community: A Pragmatic Randomized Trial of Home-Based COVID-19 Testing With Native American and Latino Communities
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years old or older
* Member of study community
* No current significant symptoms consistent with COVID-19
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* < 18 years old
* Not a member of the study community
* Current significant symptoms consistent with COVID-19
